name: Pin The Donkey On The Tail
name_original: Pin The Donkey On The Tail
description:
It's baby's birthday, and she wants to play a game!

Launch donkey parts at the tail, and get them to stick (butt joins to tail, neck joins to head, thigh joins to body, etc). Attach all parts to the body to win.

angles work best around 45, force works best around 100 (give or take, each body part is a different mass, so fiddle around)

Use the reset button if you miss.

TriJam 68.9 entry, hence the bad UI and I hit the 3 hour time limit for the TriJam ... so didn't get to implement any sound effects (sad donkey noise), and didnt get a change to make the UI easier. Spending 45 minutes just on chopping up a graphic in GIMP is probably not good use of my time.

art: https://openclipart.org/detail/217463/jackass
